title: Does the taxpayers cost $200,000 an hour to President Obama to use the first air force of the Hillary Clinton campaign?
subtitle: Taxpayers pick up part of the account when the president makes electoral flights on the number one plane, but with rare exceptions, that's the only way the president can fly.
author: David Emery
vclaim: American taxpayers cost about $200,000 an hour each time President Obama travels to Air Force One for a campaign for Hillary Clinton.
